title: Musings on the Tucker Carlson Mobbing
description:
Mobs are bad, and anyone mobbed is a victim right? Well not necessarily. I discuss a twitter thread that has given me pause on my views over outrage on old unearthed material

Find Matt Jameson on twitter here: @RogueNotary

Follow me here:

twitter: @theother_95
Instagram: @theother95
Facebook: @theother95page
